title: The Guardian view on Merck’s exit: Britain’s biopharma strategy stalls in the face of China’s rise
description: Editorial: The industry’s retreat from the UK reflects a deeper shift about how Beijing is rewriting the rules of innovation
content: When Merck abruptly scrapped its billion-pound London research hub last week, critics blamed Britain’s lacklustre support for life sciences and a Scrooge-like grip on NHS drug prices. But one important factor may have been missed. That Merck, which i... [3185 chars]

title: Keir Starmer: I’d never have appointed Mandelson if I’d known what I know now
description: As questions about his judgment mount, PM breaks silence over sacking of ambassador to US
content:
Keir Starmer has broken his silence about sacking Peter Mandelson as US ambassador over the envoy’s close friendship with the financier Jeffrey Epstein.
Amid mounting questions about his political judgment, Starmer was asked why Lord Mandelson was ap... [3306 chars]

title: UK RAF Typhoon fighter jets to defend Polish airspace after Russian drone incursion
description: Tensions have risen across Europe after 19 drones entered Poland's territory earlier this month
content:
Fighter jets from the UK will join Nato allies in defending Polish airspace after last week's incursion of Russian drones, the defence secretary has confirmed.
RAF Typhoon jets will fly air defence missions over Poland as part of the military allianc... [2697 chars]

title: Crews tackle blaze in Birmingham city centre tower block
description: More than 30 firefighters are deployed to the scene on Colmore Circus Queensway in Birmingham.
content:
More than 30 firefighters are tackling a blaze on the roof of a 16-storey building that is under construction in Birmingham city centre.
The crews have been at the building on Colmore Circus Queensway, after West Midlands Fire Service (WMFS) was aler... [374 chars]

title: Family of man who died on Bibby Stockholm question mental health care
description: Sisters of Leonard Farruku tell inquest his ‘mental state was clearly not right’ and ask why he was put on the barge
content:
The family of an asylum seeker who died on the Bibby Stockholm barge say they do not understand why a man “whose mental state was clearly not right” was moved there.
An inquest into the death of Leonard Farruku, an Albanian asylum seeker whose body w... [3108 chars]
